rule_description: Deposit account records must maintain minimum 99.5% accuracy rate as measured by quarterly data quality assessments.
grounded_in: National Banking Corporation shall maintain deposit account records meeting 99.5% accuracy standards as measured by quarterly data quality assessments.

rule_description: Deposit insurance calculation must be completed within 24 hours following institution failure.
grounded_in: capable of supporting deposit insurance calculation within twenty-four (24) hours following failure

rule_description: Joint accounts require signature cards with signatures of all co-owners.
grounded_in: Joint accounts (JNT) require the CI to maintain a signature card for each joint account with the signature of each co-owner

rule_description: Beneficial owners with 25% or more ownership interest must be identified.
grounded_in: Each legal entity customer must identify beneficial owners with 25 percent or more ownership interest

rule_description: Government-issued photo identification required for all beneficial owners.
grounded_in: Documentation must include government-issued photo identification for all beneficial owners

rule_description: Ownership records must be updated within 30 days of any ownership change.
grounded_in: Records must be updated within 30 days of any ownership change

rule_description: Data completeness rate must meet or exceed 98.5% for all required fields.
grounded_in: Data completeness rate must meet or exceed 98.5% for all required fields in the deposit insurance determination file

rule_description: Missing or incomplete records must be remediated within 5 business days.
grounded_in: Missing or incomplete records must be flagged and remediated within 5 business days
